Self.Wiki: Determines the parameters for environmental lighting textures.

isUse.Wiki: If ON, this row is enabled.

autoUpdate.Wiki: If ON, this row automatically updates.

invMulCol.Wiki: All light colors are multiplied by the reciprocal of this value.

resNameId_Dif0.Wiki: The texture filename to use for this texture.

invMulCol_Dif0.Wiki: All light colors are multiplied by the reciprocal of this value.

sepcPow_Dif0.Wiki: The specular power used for this texture.

resNameId_Spc0.Wiki: The texture filename to use for this texture.

invMulCol_Spc0.Wiki: All light colors are multiplied by the reciprocal of this value.

sepcPow_Spc0.Wiki: The specular power used for this texture.

resNameId_Spc1.Wiki: The texture filename to use for this texture.

invMulCol_Spc1.Wiki: All light colors are multiplied by the reciprocal of this value.

sepcPow_Spc1.Wiki: The specular power used for this texture.

resNameId_Spc2.Wiki: The texture filename to use for this texture.

invMulCol_Spc2.Wiki: All light colors are multiplied by the reciprocal of this value.

sepcPow_Spc2.Wiki: The specular power used for this texture.

resNameId_Spc3.Wiki: The texture filename to use for this texture.

invMulCol_Spc3.Wiki: All light colors are multiplied by the reciprocal of this value.

sepcPow_Spc3.Wiki: The specular power used for this texture.

degRotX_00.Wiki: The horizontal angle to use for this light source. In degrees.

degRotY_00.Wiki: The vertical angle to use for this light source. In degrees.

colR_00.Wiki: The red component of the RGBA color used for this light source.

colG_00.Wiki: The green component of the RGBA color used for this light source.

colB_00.Wiki: The blue component of the RGBA color used for this light source.

colA_00.Wiki: The alpha component of the RGBA color used for this light source.
